entities.description: Number of times a handgun has been carried.
Number of times illegal drugs have been sold.
Number of times items worth more than $50 have been stolen or there was an attempt to steal them.
Number of times someone has been attacked with the intent to seriously hurt them.
Individuals aged 12 or older but generally refers to those under 18.
The time frame referring to the past 12 months from the current date.
The frequency with which a specific response was recorded in the dataset.
The percentage of total responses that a specific response represents in the dataset.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of times youth have carried a handgun.
Indicates the number of times youth have sold illegal drugs.
Indicates the number of times youth have stolen or attempted to steal items worth more than $50.
Indicates the number of times youth have attacked someone with the intent to seriously hurt them.
Defines the time frame for the reported incidents of carrying a handgun.
Defines the time frame for the reported incidents of selling illegal drugs.
Defines the time frame for the reported incidents of stealing or attempting to steal items worth more than $50.
Defines the time frame for the reported incidents of seriously attacking someone.
Provides the frequency of specific responses in the dataset.
Provides the percentage of specific responses in the dataset.
